table.title: average/min/max memory for all services (includes web, workers, jobs, scheduler, other)
table.searchString: index=heroku | timechart span="15m" avg(memory_total) as avg, max(memory_total) as max, min(memory_total) as min by sourcetype

table.title: average/min/max memory by application (web/workers)
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "(heroku|app) (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="(web|worker)" | timechart span="15m" avg(memory_total) as avg, max(memory_total) as max, min(memory_total) as min by sourcetype

table.title: average/min/max memory by web
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "(heroku|app) (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="web" | timechart span="3hr" avg(memory_total) as avg, max(memory_total) as max, min(memory_total) as min

table.title: average memory by web dyno (web/workers)
table.searchString: index=heroku | rex "(heroku|app) (?<dyno>\w+\.\d+) -" | regex dyno="web" | timechart span="15m" avg(memory_total) as avg by dyno
